channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Appeals court blocks order to return National Guard to California
item.description: President Trump's deployment of National Guard troops to quell protests in Los Angeles is likely illegal, a federal judge ruled Thursday, saying he fa...

item.title: Kids Don’t Just Need A Father Figure. They Need A Dad
item.description: America’s children need both fathers and dads in their lives to grow up strong and healthy.

item.title: The New Massive Resistance
item.description: Violent mobs have no legitimate part to play in our democratic republic, not in Oxford, Miss., in 1962, not in Los Angeles, Calif., in 2025.

item.title: ‘No Kings’ Nationwide Protest Theme Is An Antifa Dog Whistle
item.description: Recruitment flyers urging protesters to break the law are online, to be printed and distributed in English and Spanish.

item.title: The Claim That America ‘Stole’ California From Mexico Is An Ignorant Lie
item.description: A brief study in California history reveals the real population of the Golden State.

item.title: 'It will only get worse': Trump warns next round of Israeli strikes on Iran will be 'more brutal'
item.description: President Trump said Friday that the Israeli military campaign against Iran "will only get worse," and he urged Tehran to immediately make a deal with...

item.title: The Oprah-Approved Mama Rose Is an Angry Narcissist
item.description: Gypsy ’s famous stage mother, played by shrieking Audra McDonald, is racialized in Broadway’s latest instance of gaslighting.

item.title: Beware Of The Progressive Playbook To ‘Modernize’ Conservative Christian Churches
item.description: Local churches are facing coordinated efforts to restructure their ministries according to managerial and market-driven formulas.

item.title: The House Drew the Line on Green Cronyism — the Senate Better Not Cross It
item.description: The Senate must treat the House-passed repeal of green energy subsidies as the new floor for tax negotiations, not a ceiling.

item.title: Israel Is Not Afraid of Victory
item.description: Defanging the Iranian regime, if successful, will contribute to a more stable and peaceful status quo in the region.

item.title: Hypocrite Newsom, Who Locked Down Liberty, Scolds Trump For Restoring Order
item.description: At the height of pandemic insanity, Newsom warned those protesting against his fiats must remain six feet apart and wear masks.

item.title: 'Treasonous laws': GOP blasts sanctuary-state governors, votes to overturn D.C. law

item.title: Judge questions Trump's use of troops in California

item.title: Trump revokes Biden's order for 'equitable treatment of fish'
